casebody.data:
No. 10-6057. Charles Lamont Miller, Petitioner v. William B. Kolender, former Sheriff, San Diego County Sheriff’s Department, et al. 562 U.S. 1008, 131 S. Ct. 513, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8546,

178 L. Ed. 2d 379,

November 1, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.
